org.glassfish.admin.amx.base

Interface Tools

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AMX_SPI, AMXProxy, Singleton, Utility

    @Taxonomy(stability=UNCOMMITTED)
 @AMXMBeanMetadata(singleton=true,
                  globalSingleton=true,
                  leaf=true)
public interface Tools
extends AMXProxy, Utility, Singleton
    Useful informational tools.
    Since:
    GlassFish V3
